attributes.title: Almost died
attributes.review: I was told masks weren‚Äôt important by the trump administration so I refused to wear one. My dog seeing my actions followed my guide. My dog ran away yesterday and came back with the Corina virus since he wasn‚Äôt wearing a mask. He infected my parrot, my cat, and my goldfish. My goldfish is in critical condition and probably won‚Äôt make it past tonight. Do not trust these news!!!! Fake news! Law and order!
